SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 19
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
19
Advantages and disadvantages of option (a)
• With simultaneous visualization, adding 
more languages requires modifying the 
visualization code.
• With non simultaneous visualization, there is 
no need to modify the whole code, but it 
requires:
– Increasing the number of interfaces 
– Modifying the interface as for the selection 
options.
speaker: SYSTEM
